ReturnPolicy.Description:
Mother Jewel Return Policy

Entering a bid on one of our auction listings or purchasing a "Buy It Now" item signifies your agreement to our terms.

Item can be only be returned in brand new condition only (never worn) within 30 days of receipt. *Conditions do apply so please read criteria below.

Cancellations;
------------------
Any cancellations for whatever reason, prior to postage will incur a surcharge to cover non refundable fees.

Faulty Items; 
-----------------
Contact must be made within 7 days of receipt, replacement will be issued for faulty items, the faulty item must be returned within 14 days of receipt. 

Item does not fit*;
----------------------
If your size tags are still attached and I have the size you require I am more than happy to organise a size exchange for a small surcharge which includes regular postage of your exchange back to you. (*does not apply to earrings or other pierced products). 

Change of mind or not suitable;
----------------------------------------
If your item qualifies, (see below). You may return the item* in brand new condition (never worn) within 30 days of receipt however there will be a restocking fee to cover my original postage cost to you, PayPal and eBay fees which are not refunded to Mother Jewel.



TO QUALIFY FOR RETURN; YOUR ITEM WILL NEED TO MEET ALL OF THE FOLLOWING CRITERIA AND CONDITIONS (no exceptions will be made, please do not ask as refusal often offends)

CRITERIA:
1. Item must not have been worn and can only be returned in original condition within 30 days of receipt.  
2. Pierced products (earrings & body jewellery) must still be in sealed plastic bag; if the seal is broken then as per health regulations, return is not available.
3. Any size tags must still be attached. 
 
CONDITIONS:
1. All refunds will incur the restocking fee.
2. Any postage paid is non refundable.
3. Item must be returned in similar mail packaging as received.
4. The buyer is responsible for return postage charges and for the safe arrival of the returned item.

Title: TRULY BEAUTIFUL GIFT YELLOW GOLD GP WOMENS LADIES WRISTWATCH CRYSTAL WATCH
